Title: Blood Donut
Plot: Piper wants the prison's outdoor running track reopened, but in order to get it, she'll have to give her corrections officer something he wants.
ParentalRatingReason: Violence, nudity, sex scenes and offensive language
GuestStars: Danielle Brooks, Laverne Cox, Joel Marsh Garland, Annie Golden, Vicky Jeudy, Ezra Knight, Lauren Lapkus, Natasha Lyonne, Taryn Manning, Adrienne C. Moore, Nick Sandow, Constance Schulman, Samira Wiley
